fields.name: Remedy Studies (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to bleeding.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Exhume (Day, 3 Uses):
fields.value:
At the end of the night, learn what ~~classes~~ roles killed a player, or if they committed suicide. Can not be cancelled once used.
- Triggers at the end of the night.

fields.name: Drug (Night, 3 Uses):
fields.value: Causes a player to falsely believe they were attacked and healed.

fields.name: Defile (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value: If targeted player dies tonight, they will appear as chosen ~~class~~ role.
